body:
'DatetimeIndex' object has no attribute 'to_julian_date', would be good if it could do as pandas:
julianday = pd.DatetimeIndex(df['mydatetime']).to_julian_date()

title: [FEA] Add function "to_julian_date()"  to cuDF
